MEANINGS.POS_TIP: adjective: a word or phrase naming an attribute, added to or grammatically related to a noun to modify or describe it
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Impossible to separate or treat separately; very closely connected.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 不可分离的；密不可分的；紧密相连的。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The twins were inseparable and did everything together.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 这对双胞胎形影不离，什么事都一起做。
